caption.p: Observed and age-adjusted rates (ARs) of liver cancer from 1997 to 2016 in China. (A) The prevalence and ARs of liver cancer; (B) the incidence and ARs of liver cancer; (C) the mortality and ARs of liver cancer; (D) the observed and age-adjusted DALYs and rates of DALYs of liver cancer. DALYs, disability-adjusted life years.
